brainly_data.question:
A product advertised on television claims it can erase skin blemishes and wrinkles in 90 days or your money back. The best way to increase the scientific reliability of this claim would be to have (2 points) 

an independent research organization test the product and record the results. 

a famous actor or actress endorse the product. 

advertisements in well-respected beauty and fashion magazines. 

before and after pictures featured in the advertisement.
brainly_data.subject: Chemistry
